document.full_text: the shuttle endeavour and space station crews gathered on saturday for an unprecedented conversation with pope benedict, who asked how the space program could promote peace and if the astronauts prayed while in orbit.
document.title: astronauts offer pope unique view of earth's woes
lines_and_colors: the shuttle endeavour and space station crews gathered on saturday for an unprecedented conversation with pope benedict, who asked how the space program could promote peace and if the astronauts prayed while in orbit.
